predicate.note: Frames file for 'triple' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'double'.

roleset.name: to make three times as great

example.name: with start and end points
example.text: Net income more than tripled to 4.898 billion yen from 1.457 billion yen a year earlier .

example.name: intransitive with adverbials
example.text: At Giant Bicycle Inc. , Rancho Dominguez , Calif. , sales have tripled since the company entered the U.S. mountain-bike business in 1987 .

since the company entered the U.S. mountain-bike business in 1987

example.name: with start point
example.text: Revenue last year increased by more than 11 % over 1988 , and net income nearly tripled from restated year-earlier net of $ 900 million [*U*] .
